credit_line: Gift of Merritt A. Boyle, grandson of General Merritt Barber, Class of 1857
title: Red Otter Comes to the Rescue
inscriptions: on mount, below image in ink: White Bear with a war party in Mexico is attacked by a party of Mexicans, who lasso him, and are/ dragging him away; when Red Otter comes to the rescue and puts a few arrows into the Mexicans, who/ drop White Bear and run off, and the Indians make their escape
